channel.title: Customising VSTS Work Item Types
channel.description: [Via Rob] Dave McKinstry has recently posted about his Approach to Process Customization with TFS. While I have been practising my work item definitions on a scratch project inside a team system VPC before applying them to the production box,...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Harris+00:00
item.description:
